summary: Completed testing of skills separation bug fix and hero image update. Skills functionality is working correctly - comma-separated values are properly parsed, stored as arrays, and displayed in all templates. Hero image successfully updated from Mac to resume documents.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthorized access
minor_issues.impact: Minor - both status codes indicate authentication failure

passed_tests: Skills input field accepts comma-separated values
Skills parsing with mixed spacing (trim functionality)
Skills display in Modern template with filtering
Skills display in Classic template with filtering
Skills display in Minimal template with filtering
Hero image updated to resume documents (not Mac)
